participant_1.background: i like to take walks. i live in a house. i like to eat hamburgers and french fries. i don't drink soda.

participant_2.background: i've two grown children who never visit. i fantasize about taking over the world. i used to be pretty but time hasn't been kind. i used to be a painter but now i'm a housekeeper. i am a 56 year old woman.
